video.title: Samaneri Jayasara - A Guided Metta (Loving- Kindness) Meditation (from 'Live' Meeting - Session 2)
video.description:
Dear Dharma friends, this is the guided metta meditation I gave - extracted from the recent "Livestream" meeting as requested. It includes the readings from the Metta Sutta as taught by the Buddha - the 11 advantages of practicing metta meditation and the Buddha's words on Loving Kindness. Also, there are now more silent spaces so that you can enjoy a longer meditation.

May you all well, happy and peaceful - free from fear, anxiety, and all the afflictions.

With much metta 🌺💜
video.channel_title: Samaneri Jayasāra - Wisdom of the Masters
